ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This work was supported by a Canadian Institutes for Health Research Foundation Grant (F.P.R.); the Canada Excellence Research Chairs Program (F.P.R.); the Thistledown Foundation (B.R., F.P.R. and A.-C.G.); the LabEx Integrative Biology of Emerging Infectious Diseases (10-LABX-0062; Y.J.) and Platform for European Preparedness Against (Re-)emerging Epidemics, EU (602525; Y.J.).
